item.title: Windows Checks
item.description: Enable Windows Checks Make sure the Windows agent is installed. Metricly checks can be enabled via the configuration files included with the agent. All checks configuration files for the Windows agent can be found in C:/Program Files (x86)/CollectdWin/conf/ or C:/Program Files/CollectdWin/conf/ (depending on the version of windows). Simply change the enable setting for the ReadSystemChecks from false to true in the CollectdWin.config file to enable the system checks. To configure the checks, edit the ReadSystemChecks.
